      • clipAdapters

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> clipAdapters(java.lang.String fastxDir,
                                                 java.lang.String sampleName,
                                                 java.lang.String leftFastq,
                                                 java.lang.String rightFastq,
                                                 java.lang.String adapter1,
                                                 java.lang.String adapter2,
                                                 java.lang.String fastqReadIdPairNumberDelimiter,
                                                 Scheduler scheduler,
                                                 org.ggf.drmaa.Session drmaaSession,
                                                 java.lang.String fastqUtilsJar)
                                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                 java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                                                 org.ggf.drmaa.DrmaaException
        Clip sequencing adapters
        Parameters:
        fastxDir - Directory containing fastx binaries
        sampleName - Sample name
        leftFastq - Fastq file for read 1
        rightFastq - Fastq file for read 2
        adapter1 - Sequencing adapter for read 1
        adapter2 - Sequencing adapter for read 2
        fastqReadIdPairNumberDelimiter - Delimiter between read name and read number (1 or 2) or null if whitespace
        scheduler - Scheduler
        drmaaSession - Active DRMAA session. Pass null if not using OGS. There should only be one active session at a time. Session should have been created in the main method of the class calling this method.
        fastqUtilsJar - Path of FastqUtils.jar
        Returns:
        Collection of clipped fastq file(s). The list is either the clipped read1 file if reads are unpaired, or clipped read1 and clipped read2 if reads paired
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException
        org.ggf.drmaa.DrmaaException

      • clipAdapters

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> clipAdapters(java.lang.String fastxDir,
                                                                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> leftFastqs,
                                                                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> rightFastqs,
                                                                                 java.lang.String adapter1,
                                                                                 java.lang.String adapter2,
                                                                                 java.lang.String fastqReadIdPairNumberDelimiter,
                                                                                 Scheduler scheduler,
                                                                                 org.ggf.drmaa.Session drmaaSession,
                                                                                 java.lang.String fastqUtilsJar)
                                                                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                 java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                                                                                 org.ggf.drmaa.DrmaaException
        Clip sequencing adapters
        Parameters:
        fastxDir - Directory containing fastx binaries
        leftFastqs - Map of sample name to read 1 fastq file
        rightFastqs - Map of sample name to read 2 fastq file or null if all samples are single end
        adapter1 - Sequencing adapter for read 1
        adapter2 - Sequencing adapter for read 2
        fastqReadIdPairNumberDelimiter - Delimiter between read name and read number (1 or 2) or null if whitespace
        scheduler - Scheduler
        drmaaSession - Active DRMAA session. Pass null if not using OGS. There should only be one active session at a time. Session should have been created in the main method of the class calling this method.
        fastqUtilsJar - Path of FastqUtils.jar
        Returns:
        Map of sample name to clipped fastq file(s). The list is either the clipped read1 file if reads are unpaired, or clipped read1 and clipped read2 if reads paired
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        java.io.IOException
        org.ggf.drmaa.DrmaaException

      • filterPairedFastqFilesMissingReads

        public static void filterPairedFastqFilesMissingReads(java.lang.String inFastq1,
                                      java.lang.String inFastq2,
                                      java.lang.String outFastq1,
                                      java.lang.String outFastq2,
                                      java.lang.String fastqReadIdPairNumberDelimiter)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        Remove reads that are missing from file1 or file2 and write new fastq files
        Parameters:
        inFastq1 - Input fastq file read 1
        inFastq2 - Input fastq file read 2
        outFastq1 - Output fastq file read 1
        outFastq2 - Output fastq file read 2
        fastqReadIdPairNumberDelimiter - Delimiter between read name and read number (1 or 2), or null if whitespace
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • divideFastqFile

        public static java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> divideFastqFile(java.lang.String fastq,
                                                     int numOutFiles)
                                                              throws java.io.IOException
        Divide a fastq file into several smaller fastq files and write to same directory
        Parameters:
        fastq - Original fastq file
        numOutFiles - Number of smaller files to write
        Returns:
        The names of files written
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Throws:
